features: Natural Bottle with Natural Response nipple: Baby controls the pace, just like breastfeeding
Designed with a unique opening and tip which only releases milk when baby actively drinks. When pausing to swallow and breathe no milk flows, just like at the breast.
No-drip nipple design helps prevent lost milk from the tip, giving you peace of mind; Bottle Nipple comes in Flow 3
Anti-colic valve is designed to reduce colic and discomfort by sending air away from your baby's tummy
Newborn gift set with ultra air pacifiersthat feature 4 large air holes in the shield to let baby’s skin breathe and maximize air flow to baby's sensitive skin
Includes: 2 9oz Purple Natural bottles, 2 pink ultra air pacifiers 0-6 months
body.description: Philips Avent Purple Natural bottles and pink ultra air pacifiers. The Natural bottle with Natural Response nipple lets baby control the pace of the milk, like they do when breastfeeding. The nipples' unique opening and tip only releases milk when your baby actively drinks. When pausing to swallow and breathe no milk flows. Baby can drink, swallow, and breathe using their natural rhythm, just like they do when breastfeeding. Easily combine breast and bottle feeding with a wide breast-shaped nipple with a soft feel that mimics the shape and feel of a breast; plus baby controlling the flow of milk like they do when breastfeeding. The nipple has a no-drip design which helps prevent lost milk from the tip. An anti-colic valve integrated into the nipple is designed to reduce colic and discomfort by sending air away from your baby's tummy. The ergonomic shape makes it comfortable for parents to hold. Assembly is simple with only a few parts and the wide bottle neck makes filling and cleaning easy. The Natural bottle is made from polypropylene, a BPA free material, and works with all nipples and caps from the Natural line. The Natural response nipples come in flow rates 1-5. Ultra air pacifiers have 4 large air holes in the shield to let baby’s skin breathe and maximize air flow to baby's sensitive skin. Includes: 2 9oz Purple Natural bottles, 2 pink ultra air pacifiers 0-6 months. SCD837/01 What to expect when introducing the Philips Avent Natural Response Nipple It is totally natural for your baby to take 2-3 tries to get milk flowing from a new bottle. Unlike traditional bottles the Natural bottle is designed to only release milk when your baby is actively drinking, like what happens when babies breastfeed. We have 5 different nipple flow rates for the Natural bottle. When looking for the right nipple flow rate, age is a guide, but your baby's approach to drinking and the feeding cues they will show will help determine when to move to a higher or lower nipple flow rate.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only bottle my baby took.
reviews.reviewText: I tried several different bottles with my newborn and she would spit out a lot of milk but with these she has no spit out at all. I also appreciate that it doesn’t spill at all so no worries about the bottle staining sheets or making mess like other name brand bottles.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves them
reviews.reviewText: Bought these bottles to transition to 5oz for my 6 month old. It was the exact same nipple as his smaller bottles and a easy transition

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are by far my favorite bottles to use. I’ve used the Dr Browns and MAM brands, but my daughter drinks best out of these. Also, they dont have as many parts to clean. My only complaint is that the color is darker in person. I thought they would be a lighter tint.

reviews.reviewText: Gave this baby bottle as a gift and it was perfect! Love the color and the brand is a trusted brand. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good bottles for newborn
reviews.reviewText: Our baby really likes these bottles and nipple shape. I just wish the pacifier mimicked the nipple shape in the bottles as my baby only likes that shape nipple at the moment.
